about_the_game:
The College Bound saga continues with Episode 3!

College life can be a grind at times and an absolute blast at other times. Whether in the classroom or outside of it, Episode 3 gives our hero a number of new avenues to explore. The "Party of the Century" kicks things off. Sure, it's hard for any party live up to that kind of billing, but it does open up a few doors - both good and bad - that the player may choose to step through...or not. Should you have some sexy fun with friend and foe alike, or should you stay true to your girlfriend? The choice is yours, but either way, be prepared to deal with the consequences - positive and negative.

The fun isn't limited to just your time at the university, either! You run into a wide variety of MILFs in your day to day activities, ranging from your sexy landlady to your beautiful boss. You also discover that all the cutest girls your age aren't just at your school - you run into them all over town. Of course, only you can determine whether a free-wheeling lifestyle or allegiance to your one true love is the way to go. Being the stud that you are, there are temptations at every turn.

What will you do? How will you choose to live your life? Will you be on the side of lawful good, or chaotic evil? OK, OK, this isn't that kind of game, but still, whether to live a moral, reserved life or something a bit more on the wild side is entirely up to you.

Try College Bound Episode 3 today, and live how you want to live!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game graphically depicts sex and includes mature themes such as drug use and elements of blackmail. While most of the story is light-hearted, parts of it may be problematic for some individuals, especially those easily offended. Please consider this before playing College Bound. Outside of that, have fun and enjoy the ride! All of the scenes are animated, well developed and written to add to the story and the enjoyment of our players.

All characters depicted are at least 21 years of age or older + all sexual acts are consensual. Cheers!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.11+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

name: College Bound - Episode 3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
